content.gatha1: Kiṃchando kimadhippāyo, eko sammasi ghammani;
content.gathalast: Kiṃ patthayāno kiṃ esaṃ, kena atthena brāhmaṇa.
content.gatha1: Yathā mahā vāridharo, kumbho supariṇāhavāsupariṇāmavā ;
content.gathalast: Tathūpamaṃ ambapakkaṃ, vaṇṇagandharasuttamaṃ.
content.gatha1: Taṃ vuyhamānaṃ sotena, disvānāmalamajjhime;
content.gathalast: Pāṇīhi naṃ gahetvāna, agyāyatanamāhariṃ.
content.gatha1: Tato kadalipattesu, nikkhipitvā sayaṃ ahaṃ;
content.gathalast: Satthena naṃ vikappetvā, khuppipāsaṃ ahāsi me.
content.gatha1: Sohaṃ apetadaratho, byantībhūtobyantibhūtobyantibhūtobyantibhūto dukhakkhamo;
content.gathalast: Assādaṃ nādhigacchāmi, phalesvaññesu kesucikesupikesupi .
content.gatha1: Sosetvā nūna maraṇaṃ, taṃ mamaṃ āvahissati;
content.gatha2: Ambaṃ yassa phalaṃ sādu, madhuraggaṃ manoramaṃ;
content.gathalast: Yamuddhariṃ vuyhamānaṃ, udadhismā mahaṇṇave.
content.gatha1: Akkhātaṃ te mayā sabbaṃ, yasmā upavasāmahaṃ;
content.gathalast: Rammaṃ pati nisinnosmi, puthulomāyutā puthu.
content.gatha1: Tvañca kho mevamemama akkhāhi, attānamapalāyini;
content.gathalast: Kā vā tvamasi kalyāṇi, kissa vā tvaṃ sumajjhime.
content.gatha1: Ruppapaṭṭapalimaṭṭhīvaruppapaṭṭaplamaṭṭhīvarūpapaṭṭapamaṭṭhīva , byagghīva girisānujā;
content.gathalast: Yā santi nāriyo devesu, devānaṃ paricārikā.
content.gatha1: Yā ca manussalokasmiṃ, rūpenānvāgatitthiyo;
content.gatha2: Rūpena te sadisī natthi, devesu gandhabbamanussaloke devagandhabbamānuse (syā.);
content.gathalast: Puṭṭhāsi me cārupubbaṅgi, brūhi nāmañca bandhave.
content.gatha1: Yaṃ tvaṃ pati nisinnosi, rammaṃ brāhmaṇa kosikiṃ;
content.gathalast: Sāhaṃ bhusālayā vutthā, varavārivahoghasā.
content.gatha1: Nānādumagaṇākiṇṇā, bahukā girikandarā;
content.gathalast: Mameva pamukhā honti, abhisandanti pāvuse.
content.gatha1: Atho bahū vanatodā, nīlavārivahindharā;
content.gathalast: Bahukā nāgavittodā, abhisandanti vārinā.
content.gatha1: Tā ambajambulabujā, nīpā tālā cudumbarātālamudumbarātālamudumbarā ;
content.gathalast: Bahūni phalajātāni, āvahanti abhiṇhaso.
content.gatha1: Yaṃ kiñci ubhato tīre, phalaṃ patati ambuni;
content.gathalast: Asaṃsayaṃ taṃ sotassa, phalaṃ hoti vasānugaṃ.
content.gatha1: Etadaññāya medhāvi, puthupañña suṇohi me;
content.gathalast: Mā rocaya mabhisaṅgaṃ, paṭisedha janādhipa.
content.gatha1: Na vāhaṃ vaḍḍhavaṃvaddhavaṃvaddhavaṃ maññe, yaṃ tvaṃ raṭṭhābhivaḍḍhana;
content.gathalast: Āceyyamāno rājisi, maraṇaṃ abhikaṅkhasi.
content.gatha1: Tassa jānanti pitaro, gandhabbā ca sadevakā;
content.gathalast: Ye cāpi isayo loke, saññatattā tapassino;
Asaṃsayaṃ tepitete jānanti, paṭṭhabhūtāvaddhabhūtāvaddhabhūtā yasassino.
content.gatha1: Evaṃ viditvā vidū sabbadhammaṃ, viddhaṃsanaṃ cavanaṃ jīvitassa;
content.gathalast: Na cīyatī tassa narassa pāpaṃ, sace na ceteti vadhāya tassa.
content.gatha1: Isipūgasamaññāte, evaṃ lokyā viditā satipatipatipati ;
content.gathalast: Anariyaparisambhāse, pāpakammaṃ jigīsasijigiṃsasijigiṃsasijigiṃsasi .
content.gatha1: Sace ahaṃ marissāmi, tīre te puthusussoṇi;
content.gathalast: Asaṃsayaṃ taṃ asiloko, mayi pete āgamissati.
content.gatha1: Tasmā hi pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, rakkhassevarakkhassu ca sumajjhime;
content.gathalast: Mā taṃ sabbo jano pacchā, pakuṭṭhāyi pakatthāsi (sī. pī.), patvakkhāsi (syā.) mayi mate.
content.gatha1: Aññātametaṃ avisayhasāhi, attānamambañca dadāmi te taṃ;
content.gathalast: So duccaje kāmaguṇe pahāya, santiñca dhammañca adhiṭṭhitosi.
content.gatha1: Yo hitvā pubbasaññogaṃ, pacchā saṃyojane ṭhito;
content.gathalast: Adhammañceva carati, pāpañcassa pavaḍḍhati.
content.gatha1: Ehi taṃ pāpayissāmi, kāmaṃ appossuko bhava;
content.gathalast: Upānayāmi sītasmiṃ, viharāhi anussuko.
content.gatha1: Taṃ puppharasamattebhi, vakkaṅgehi arindama;
content.gathalast: Koñcā mayūrā diviyā, kolaṭṭhimadhusāḷikā;
Kūjitā haṃsapūgehi, kokilettha pabodhare.
content.gatha1: Ambettha vippasākhaggāvippasūnaggāvippasūnaggāvippasūnaggāvippaonaggā , palālakhalasannibhā;
content.gathalast: Kosambasaḷalākosumbhasalalākosumbhasalalākosumbhasalalā nīpā, pakkatālavilambino.
content.gatha1: Mālī tiriṭī kāyūrī, aṅgadī candanussadocandanassado ;
content.gathalast: Rattiṃ tvaṃ paricāresi, divā vedesi vedanaṃ.
content.gatha1: Soḷasitthisahassāni, yā temā paricārikā;
content.gathalast: Evaṃ mahānubhāvosi, abbhuto lomahaṃsano.
content.gatha1: Kiṃ kammamakarī pubbe, pāpaṃ attadukhāvahaṃ;
content.gathalast: Yaṃ karitvā manussesu, piṭṭhimaṃsāni khādasi.
content.gatha1: Ajjhenāni paṭiggayha, kāmesu gadhitogathitogathitogiddhitogiddhitogiddhikogiddhiko ahaṃ;
content.gathalast: Acariṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ, paresaṃ ahitāyahaṃ.
content.gatha1: Yo piṭṭhimaṃsiko hoti, evaṃ ukkacca khādati;
content.gathalast: Yathāhaṃ ajja khādāmi, piṭṭhimaṃsāni attanoti.
content.gatha1: Ko pāturāsī tidivā nabhamhi, obhāsayaṃ saṃvariṃ candimāva;
content.gathalast: Gattehi te rasmiyo niccharanti, sateratāsateritāsateritāsateritā vijjurivantalikkhe.
content.gatha1: So chinnavātaṃ kamasī aghamhi, vehāyasaṃ gacchasi tiṭṭhasī ca;
content.gathalast: Iddhī nu te vatthukatā subhāvitā, anaddhagūnaṃ api devatānaṃ.
content.gatha1: Vehāyasaṃ gammamāgammakamamāgammakamamāgamma tiṭṭhasi, kumbhaṃ kiṇāthāti yametamatthaṃ;
content.gathalast: Ko vā tuvaṃ kissa vā tāya kumbho, akkhāhi me brāhmaṇa etamatthaṃ.
content.gatha1: Na sappikumbho napi telakumbho, na phāṇitassa na madhussa kumbho;
content.gathalast: Kumbhassa vajjāni anappakāni, dose bahū kumbhagate suṇātha.
content.gatha1: Gaḷeyya yaṃ pitvāpītvāpītvā pate papātaṃ, sobbhaṃ guhaṃ candaniyoḷigallaṃ;
content.gathalast: Bahumpi bhuñjeyya abhojaneyyaṃ, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
content.gatha1: Yaṃ pitvāyaṃ ve pītvā cittasmimanesamāno, āhiṇḍatī goriva bhakkhasārībhakkhasādībhakkhasādībhakkhasādī ;
content.gathalast: Anāthamāno upagāyati naccati ca, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
content.gatha1: Yaṃ ve pivitvā acelova naggo, careyya gāme visikhantarāni;
content.gathalast: Sammūḷhacitto ativelasāyī, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
content.gatha1: Yaṃ pitvā uṭṭhāya pavedhamāno, sīsañca bāhuñcabāhañca pacālayanto;
content.gathalast: So naccatī dārukaṭallakova, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
content.gatha1: Yaṃ ve pivitvā aggidaḍḍhā sayanti, atho sigālehipi khāditāse;
content.gathalast: Bandhaṃ vadhaṃ bhogajāniñcupenti, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
content.gatha1: Yaṃ pitvā bhāseyya ābhāsaneyyaṃ, sabhāyamāsīno apetavattho;
content.gathalast: Sammakkhitosamakkhito vantagato byasanno, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
content.gatha1: Yaṃ ve pivitvā ukkaṭṭho āvilakkho, mameva sabbā pathavīti maññemaññati ;
content.gathalast: Na me samo cāturantopi rājā, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
content.gatha1: Mānātimānā kalahāni pesuṇī, dubbaṇṇinī naggayinī palāyinī;
content.gathalast: Corāna dhuttāna gatī niketo, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
content.gatha1: Iddhāni phītāni kulāni assu, anekasāhassadhanāni loke;
content.gathalast: Ucchinnadāyajjakatānimāya, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
content.gatha1: Dhaññaṃ dhanaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpaṃ, khettaṃ gavaṃ yattha vināsayanti;
content.gathalast: Ucchedanī vittavataṃucchedanī vittagataṃucchedanivittagataṃ kulānaṃ, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
content.gatha1: Yaṃ ve pitvā dittarūpovaduṭṭharūpova poso, akkosati mātaraṃ pitarañca;
content.gathalast: Sassumpi gaṇheyya athopi suṇhaṃ, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
content.gatha1: Yaṃ ve pitvā dittarūpāva nārī, akkosati sasuraṃ sāmikañca;
content.gathalast: Dāsampi gaṇhe paricārakampi, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
content.gatha1: Yaṃ ve pivitvānayañce pītvāna haneyya poso, dhamme ṭhitaṃ samaṇaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vā;
content.gathalast: Gacche apāyampi tatonidānaṃ, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
content.gatha1: Yaṃ ve pivitvā duccaritaṃ caranti, kāyena vācāya ca cetasā ca;
content.gathalast: Nirayaṃ vajanti duccaritaṃ caritvā, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
content.gatha1: Yaṃ yācamānā na labhanti pubbe, bahuṃ hiraññampi pariccajantā;
content.gathalast: So taṃ pivitvā alikaṃ bhaṇāti, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
content.gatha1: Yaṃ ve pitvā pesane pesiyanto, accāyike karaṇīyamhi jāte;
content.gathalast: Atthampi so nappajānāti vutto, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
content.gatha1: Hirīmanāpi ahirīkabhāvaṃ, pātuṃ karonti madanāyamadirāya mattā;
content.gathalast: Dhīrāpi santā bahukaṃ bhaṇanti, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
content.gatha1: Yaṃ ve pitvā ekathūpā sayanti, anāsakā thaṇḍiladukkhaseyyaṃ;
content.gathalast: Dubbaṇṇiyaṃ āyasakyañcupenti, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
content.gatha1: Yaṃ ve pitvā pattakhandhā sayanti, gāvo kuṭahatāva na hi vāruṇiyā;
content.gathalast: yaṃ ve pitvā pattakkhandhā, sayanti gāvo kūṭahatāriva; na hi vāruṇiyā vego, narena sussahoriva; (sī.) Vego narena susahorivayaṃ ve pitvā pattakkhandhā, sayanti gāvo kūṭahatāriva; na hi vāruṇiyā vego, narena sussahoriva; , tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
content.gatha1: Yaṃ manussā vivajjenti, sappaṃ ghoravisaṃ mivavisamivavisaṃ ivavisāmiva ;
content.gathalast: Taṃ loke visasamānaṃ, ko naro pātumarahati.
content.gatha1: Yaṃ ve pitvā andhakaveṇḍaputtā, samuddatīre paricārayantā andhakaveṇhuputtā (sī. pī.), aṇḍakaveṇḍaputtā (ka.);
content.gathalast: Upakkamuṃ musalehaññamaññaṃ, tassā puṇṇaṃ kumbhamimaṃ kiṇātha.
content.gatha1: Yaṃ ve pitvā pubbadevā pamattā, tidivā cutā sassatiyā samāya;
content.gathalast: Taṃ tādisaṃ majjamimaṃ niratthakaṃ, jānaṃ mahārāja kathaṃ piveyya.
content.gatha1: Nayimasmiṃ kumbhasmiṃ dadhi vā madhu vā, evaṃ abhiññāya kiṇāhi rāja;
content.gathalast: Evañhimaṃ kumbhagatā mayā te, akkhātarūpaṃ tava sabbamitta.
content.gatha1: Na me pitā vā athavāpi mātā, etādisā yādisako tuvaṃsi;
content.gathalast: Hitānukampī paramatthakāmo, sohaṃ karissaṃ vacanaṃ tavajja.
content.gatha1: Dadāmi te gāmavarāni pañca, dāsīsataṃ satta gavaṃ satāni;
content.gathalast: Ājaññayutte ca rathe dasa ime, ācariyo hosi mamatthakāmo.
content.gatha1: Taveva dāsīsatamatthu rāja, gāmā ca gāvo ca taveva hontu;
content.gathalast: Ājaññayuttā ca rathā taveva, sakkohamasmī tidasānamindo.
content.gatha1: Maṃsodanaṃ sappipāyāsaṃsappipāyañca bhuñja, khādassu ca tvaṃ madhumāsapūve;
content.gathalast: Evaṃ tuvaṃ dhammarato janinda, anindito saggamupehi ṭhānanti.
content.gatha1: Cirassaṃ vata me udapādi ajja, bhakkho mahā sattamibhattakāle;
content.gathalast: Kutosi ko vāsi tadiṅgha brūhi, ācikkha jātiṃ vidito yathāsi.
content.gatha1: Pañcālarājā migavaṃ paviṭṭho, jayaddiso nāma yadissuto te;
content.gathalast: Carāmi kacchāni vanāni cāhaṃ, pasadaṃ imaṃ khāda mamajja muñca.
content.gatha1: Seneva tvaṃ paṇasi sassamānosayhamānosayhamāno , mamesa bhakkho pasado yaṃ vadesi;
content.gathalast: Taṃ khādiyāna pasadaṃ jighaññaṃjighacchaṃ , khādissaṃ pacchā na vilāpakālo.
content.gatha1: Na catthi mokkho mama nikkayenavikkayena , gantvāna paccāgamanāya paṇhe;
content.gathalast: Taṃ saṅkaraṃsaṅgaraṃsaṅgaraṃsaṅgaraṃ brāhmaṇassappadāya, saccānurakkhī punarāvajissaṃ.
content.gatha1: Kiṃ kammajātaṃ anutappate tvaṃanutappatī taṃanutappatī taṃ , pattaṃ samīpaṃ maraṇassa rāja;
content.gathalast: Ācikkha me taṃ api sakkuṇemu, anujānituṃ āgamanāya paṇhe.
content.gatha1: Katā mayā brāhmaṇassa dhanāsā, taṃ saṅkaraṃ paṭimukkaṃ na muttaṃ;
content.gathalast: Taṃ saṅkaraṃ brāhmaṇassappadāya, saccānurakkhī punarāvajissaṃ.
content.gatha1: Yā te katā brāhmaṇassa dhanāsā, taṃ saṅkaraṃ paṭimukkaṃ na muttaṃ;
content.gathalast: Taṃ saṅkaraṃ brāhmaṇassappadāya, saccānurakkhī punarāvajassu.
content.gatha1: Mutto ca so porisādassapurisādassa hatthā, gantvā sakaṃ mandiraṃ kāmakāmī;
content.gathalast: Taṃ saṅkaraṃ brāhmaṇassappadāya, āmantayī puttamalīnasattaṃ sattuṃ (syā. pī. ka.).
content.gatha1: Ajjeva rajjaṃ abhisiñcayassu, dhammaṃ cara sesu paresu cāpi;
content.gathalast: Adhammakāro ca te māhu raṭṭhe, gacchāmahaṃ porisādassa ñatteñante .
content.gatha1: Kiṃ kamma kubbaṃ tava deva pāva devapāde (sī. syā. pī.), nārādhayī taṃ tadicchāmi sotuṃ;
content.gathalast: Yamajja rajjamhi udassaye tuvaṃ, rajjampi niccheyyaṃ tayā vināhaṃ.
content.gatha1: Na kammunā vā vacasā va tāta, aparādhitohaṃ tuviyaṃ sarāmi;
content.gathalast: Sandhiñcasaddhiṃ ca katvā purisādakena, saccānurakkhī punāhaṃ gamissaṃ.
content.gatha1: Ahaṃ gamissāmi idheva hohi, natthi tato jīvato vippamokkho;
content.gathalast: Sace tuvaṃ gacchasiyeva rāja, ahampi gacchāmi ubho na homa.
content.gatha1: Addhā hi tāta satānesa dhammo, maraṇā ca me dukkhataraṃ tadassa;
content.gathalast: Kammāsapādo taṃ yadā pacitvā, pasayha khāde bhidā rukkhasūle.
content.gatha1: Pāṇena te pāṇamahaṃ nimissaṃ, mā tvaṃ agā porisādassa ñatte;
content.gathalast: Etañca te pāṇamahaṃ nimissaṃ, tasmā mataṃ jīvitassa vaṇṇemivaremi .
content.gatha1: Tato have dhitimā rājaputto, vanditvā mātu ca pitu cavandittha mātucca pituccavandittha mātucca pitucca pāde;
content.gathalast: Dukhinissa mātā nipatānipatīnipatī pathabyā, pitāssa paggayha bhujāni kandati.
content.gatha1: Taṃ gacchantaṃ tāva pitā viditvā, parammukho vandati pañjalīko;
content.gatha2: Somo ca rājā varuṇo ca rājā, pajāpatī candimā sūriyo ca;
content.gathalast: Etehi gutto purisādakamhā, anuññāto sotthi paccehi tāta.
content.gatha1: Yaṃ daṇḍakirañño gatassayaṃ daṇḍakāraññagatassa mātā, rāmassakāsi sotthānaṃ suguttā;
content.gatha2: Taṃ te ahaṃ sotthānaṃ karomi, etena saccena sarantu devā;
content.gathalast: Anuññāto sotthi paccehi putta.
content.gatha1: Āvī raho vāpī manopadosaṃ, nāhaṃ sare jātu malīnasatte;
content.gathalast: Etena saccena sarantu devā, anuññāto sotthi paccehi bhātikabhātabhātābhātā .
content.gatha1: Yasmā ca me anadhimanosi sāmi, na cāpi me manasā appiyosi;
content.gathalast: Etena saccena sarantu devā, anuññāto sotthi paccehi sāmi.
content.gatha1: Brahā ujū cārumukho kutosi, na maṃ pajānāsi vane vasantaṃ;
content.gathalast: Luddaṃ maṃ ñatvā ‘‘purisādako’’ti, ko sotthi mājānamidhā’vajeyya.
content.gatha1: Jānāmi ludda purisādako tvaṃ, na taṃ na jānāmi vane vasantaṃ;
content.gathalast: Ahañca puttosmi jayaddisassa, mamajja khāda pituno pamokkhā.
content.gatha1: Jānāmi puttotiputtosiputtosi jayaddisassa, tathā hi vo mukhavaṇṇo ubhinnaṃ;
content.gathalast: Sudukkaraññevasudukkarañcevasudukkarañcevasudukkarañceva kataṃ tavedaṃ, yo mattumicche pituno pamokkhā.
content.gatha1: Na dukkaraṃ kiñci mahettha maññe, yo mattumicche pituno pamokkhā;
content.gathalast: Mātu camātucca hetu paraloka gantvāgamyāgamyāgamya , sukhena saggena ca sampayutto.
content.gatha1: Ahañca kho attano pāpakiriyaṃ, āvī raho vāpi sare na jātu;
content.gathalast: Saṅkhātajātīmaraṇohamasmi, yatheva me idha tathā parattha.
content.gatha1: Khādajja maṃ dāni mahānubhāva, karassu kiccāni imaṃ sarīraṃ;
content.gathalast: Rukkhassa vā te papatāmi aggā, chādayamāno mayhaṃ tvamadesi maṃsaṃ.
content.gatha1: Idañca te ruccati rājaputta, cajesicajāsicajāsi pāṇaṃ pituno pamokkhā;
content.gathalast: Tasmā hi so tasmātiha (sī. syā.) tvaṃ taramānarūpo, sambhañja kaṭṭhāni jalehi aggiṃ.
content.gatha1: Tato have dhitimā rājaputto, dāruṃ samāhatvā mahantamaggiṃ;
content.gathalast: Sandīpayitvā paṭivedayittha, ādīpito dāni mahāyamaggimayā yakkhamaggi .
content.gatha1: Khādajja maṃ dāni pasayhakārī, kiṃ maṃ muhuṃ pekkhasi haṭṭhalomo;
content.gathalast: Tathā tathā tuyhamahaṃ karomi, yathā yathā maṃ chādayamāno adesi.
content.gatha1: Ko tādisaṃ arahati khāditāye, dhamme ṭhitaṃ saccavādiṃ vadaññuṃ;
content.gathalast: Muddhāpi tassa viphaleyya sattadhā, yo tādisaṃ saccavādiṃ adeyya.
content.gatha1: Idañhi so brāhmaṇaṃ maññamāno, saso avāsesi sake sarīre;
content.gathalast: Teneva so candimā devaputto, sasatthutosasaṭṭhako kāmaduhajjakāmaruhajja yakkha.
content.gatha1: Cando yathā rāhumukhā pamutto, virocate pannaraseva bhāṇumābhānumābhānumā ;
content.gatha2: Evaṃ tuvaṃ porisādā pamutto, viroca kampillakampillakapilekapille mahānubhāva;
content.gathalast: Āmodayaṃ pitaraṃ mātarañca, sabbo ca te nandatu ñātipakkho.
content.gatha1: Tato have dhitimā rājaputto, katañjalī pariyāyapariyagāpaggayhapaggayha porisādaṃ;
content.gathalast: Anuññāto sotthi sukhī arogo, paccāgamāpaccāga kampilla’malīnasattokampilla’malīnasattokapilamalīnasattākapila’malīnasattā .
content.gatha1: Taṃ negamā jānapadā ca sabbe, hatthārohā rathikā pattikā ca;
content.gathalast: Namassamānā pañjalikā upāgamuṃ, namatthu te dukkarakārakosīti.
content.gatha1: Kiṃ nu socasinuccaṅgi, paṇḍūsi varavaṇṇini;
content.gathalast: Milāyasi visālakkhi, mālāva parimadditā.
content.gatha1: Dohaḷo me mahārāja, supinantenupajjhagā nu’paccagā (sī. syā. pī.);
content.gathalast: Na so sulabharūpova, yādiso mama dohaḷo.
content.gatha1: Ye keci mānusā kāmā, idha lokasmi nandane;
content.gathalast: Sabbe te pacurā mayhaṃ, ahaṃ te dammi dohaḷaṃ.
content.gatha1: Luddā deva samāyantu, ye keci vijite tava;
content.gathalast: Etesaṃ ahamakkhissaṃ, yādiso mama dohaḷo.
content.gatha1: Ime te luddakā devi, katahatthā visāradā;
content.gathalast: Vanaññū ca migaññū ca, mamatthemama te cattajīvitā.
content.gatha1: Luddaputtā nisāmetha, yāvantettha samāgatā;
content.gatha2: Chabbisāṇaṃ gajaṃ setaṃ, addasaṃ supine ahaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tassa dantehi me attho, alābhe natthi jīvitaṃ.
content.gatha1: Na no pitūnaṃ na pitāmahānaṃ, diṭṭho suto kuñjaro chabbisāṇo;
content.gathalast: Yamaddasā supine rājaputtī, akkhāhi no yādiso hatthināgo.
content.gatha1: Disā catasso vidisā catasso, uddhaṃ adho dasa disā imāyo;
content.gathalast: Katamaṃ disaṃ tiṭṭhati nāgarājā, yamaddasā supine chabbisāṇaṃ.
content.gatha1: Ito ujuṃ uttariyaṃ disāyaṃ, atikkamma so sattagirī brahante;
content.gathalast: Suvaṇṇapasso nāma girī uḷāro, supupphitosampupphito kimpurisānuciṇṇo.
content.gatha1: Āruyha selaṃ bhavanaṃ kinnarānaṃ, olokaya pabbatapādamūlaṃ;
content.gathalast: Atha dakkhasī meghasamānavaṇṇaṃ, nigrodharājaṃ atha sahassapādaṃ poraṃ (ka.).
content.gatha1: Tatthacchatī kuñjaro chabbisāṇo, sabbaseto duppasaho parebhi;
content.gathalast: Rakkhanti naṃ aṭṭhasahassanāgā, īsādantā vātajavappahārino.
content.gatha1: Tiṭṭhanti te tumūlaṃtumūlabhimūlabhimūla passasantā, kuppanti vātassapi eritassa;
content.gathalast: Manussabhūtaṃ pana tattha disvā, bhasmaṃ kareyyuṃ nāssa rajopi tassa.
content.gatha1: Bahū hime rājakulamhi santi, piḷandhanā jātarūpassa devī;
content.gatha2: Muttāmaṇīveḷuriyāmayā ca, kiṃ kāhasi dantapiḷandhanena;
content.gathalast: Māretukāmā kuñjaraṃ chabbisāṇaṃ, udāhu ghātessasi luddaputte.
content.gatha1: Sā issitā dukkhitā casmi ludda, uddhañca sussāmi anussarantī;
content.gathalast: Karohi me luddaka etamatthaṃ, dassāmi te gāmavarāni pañca.
content.gatha1: Katthacchatī katthamupeti ṭhānaṃ, vīthissa kā nhānanahānanahāna gatassa hoti;
content.gathalast: Kathañhi so nhāyatinahāyatinahāyati nāgarājā, kathaṃ vijānemu gatiṃ gajassa.
content.gatha1: Tattheva sā pokkharaṇī adūreavidūreavidūre , rammā sutitthā ca mahodikāmahodakāmahodakā ca;
content.gathalast: Sampupphitā bhamaragaṇānuciṇṇā kiṇṇā (katthaci), ettha hi so nhāyati nāgarājā.
content.gatha1: Sīsaṃ nahātuppalanahāto uppalanahāto uppalanahāto uppala mālabhārī, sabbaseto puṇḍarīkattacaṅgī;
content.gathalast: Āmodamāno gacchati sanniketaṃ, purakkhatvā mahesiṃ sabbabhaddaṃ.
content.gatha1: Tattheva so uggahetvāna vākyaṃ, ādāya tūṇiñca dhanuñca luddo;
content.gathalast: Vituriyativituriya sovituriya so sattagirī brahante, suvaṇṇapassaṃ nāma giriṃ uḷāraṃ.
content.gatha1: Āruyha selaṃ bhavanaṃ kinnarānaṃ, olokayī pabbatapādamūlaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tatthaddasā meghasamānavaṇṇaṃ, nigrodharājaṃ aṭṭhasahassapādaṃ.
content.gatha1: Tatthaddasā kuñjaraṃ chabbisāṇaṃ, sabbasetaṃ duppasahaṃ parebhi;
content.gathalast: Rakkhanti naṃ aṭṭhasahassanāgā, īsādantā vātajavappahārino.
content.gatha1: Tatthaddasā pokkharaṇiṃ adūre, rammaṃ sutitthañca mahodikañca;
content.gathalast: Sampupphitaṃ bhamaragaṇānuciṇṇaṃ, yattha hi so nhāyati nāgarājā.
content.gatha1: Disvāna nāgassa gatiṃ ṭhitiñca, vīthissa yā nhānagatassa hoti;
content.gathalast: Opātamāgacchi anariyarūpo, payojito cittavasānugāya.
content.gatha1: Khaṇitvāna kāsuṃ phalakehi chādayi, attānamodhāya dhanuñca luddo;
content.gathalast: Passāgataṃ puthusallena nāgaṃ, samappayī dukkaṭakammakārī.
content.gatha1: Viddho ca nāgo koñcamanādi ghoraṃ, sabbe ca sabbeva (sī. syā. pī.) nāgā ninnaduṃninnāduninnādaṃ ghorarūpaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tiṇañca kaṭṭhañca raṇaṃcuṇṇaṃcuṇṇaṃcuṇṇaṃ karontā, dhāviṃsu te aṭṭhadisā samantato.
content.gatha1: Vadhissametantivadhissamenanti parāmasanto, kāsāvamaddakkhi dhajaṃ isīnaṃ;
content.gathalast: Dukkhena phuṭṭhassudapādi saññā, arahaddhajo sabbhi avajjharūpo.
content.gatha1: Anikkasāvo kāsāvaṃ, yo vatthaṃ paridahissatiparidahessatiparidahessatiparidhassati ;
content.gathalast: Apeto damasaccena, na so kāsāvamarahati.
content.gatha1: Yo ca vantakasāvassa, sīlesu susamāhito;
content.gathalast: Upeto damasaccena, sa ve kāsāvamarahati.
content.gatha1: Samappito puthusallena nāgo, aduṭṭhacitto luddakamajjhabhāsi;
content.gathalast: Kimatthayaṃ kissa vā samma hetu, mamaṃ vadhī kassa vāyaṃ payogo.
content.gatha1: Kāsissa rañño mahesī bhadante, sā pūjitā rājakule subhaddā;
content.gathalast: Taṃ addasā sā ca mamaṃ asaṃsi, dantehi atthoti ca maṃatthoti mamaṃatthoti mamaṃ avoca.
content.gatha1: Bahū hi me dantayugā uḷārā, ye me pitūnañcapitunnampi pitāmahānaṃ;
content.gathalast: Jānāti sā kodhanā rājaputtī, vadhatthikā veramakāsi bālā.
content.gatha1: Uṭṭhehi tvaṃ ludda kharaṃ gahetvā, dante ime chinda purā marāmi;
content.gathalast: Vajjāsi taṃ kodhanaṃ rājaputtiṃ, ‘‘nāgo hato handa imassa dantā’’.
content.gatha1: Uṭṭhāya so luddo kharaṃ gahetvā, chetvāna dantāni gajuttamassa;
content.gathalast: Vaggū subhe appaṭime pathabyā, ādāya pakkāmi tato hi khippaṃ.
content.gatha1: Bhayaṭṭitābhayadditābhayadditā nāgavadhena aṭṭā, ye te nāgā aṭṭha disā vidhāvuṃ;
content.gathalast: Adisvānaadisvaadisva posaṃ gajapaccamittaṃ, paccāgamuṃ yena so nāgarājā.
content.gatha1: Te tattha kanditvā roditvānaroditvaroditva nāgā, sīse sake paṃsukaṃ okiritvā;
content.gathalast: Agamaṃsu te sabbe sakaṃ niketaṃ, purakkhatvā mahesiṃ sabbabhaddaṃ.
content.gatha1: Ādāya dantāni gajuttamassa, vaggū subhe appaṭime pathabyā;
content.gatha2: Suvaṇṇarājīhi samantamodare, so luddako kāsipuraṃ upāgami;
content.gathalast: Upanesi so rājakaññāya dante, nāgo hato handa imassa dantā.
content.gatha1: Disvāna dantāni gajuttamassa, bhattuppiyassa purimāya jātiyā;
content.gathalast: Tattheva tassā hadayaṃ aphāli, teneva sā kālamakāsi bālā.
content.gatha1: Sambodhipatto sa ca (sī. syā.), va (pī.) mahānubhāvo, sitaṃ akāsi parisāya majjhe;
content.gathalast: Pucchiṃsu bhikkhū suvimuttacittā, nākāraṇe pātukaronti buddhā.
content.gatha1: Yamaddasātha dahariṃ kumāriṃ, kāsāyavatthaṃ anagāriyaṃ carantiṃ;
content.gathalast: Sā kho tadā rājakaññā ahosi, ahaṃ tadā nāgarājā ahosiṃ.
content.gatha1: Ādāya dantāni gajuttamassa, vaggū subhe appaṭime pathabyā;
content.gathalast: Yo luddako kāsipuraṃ upāgami, so kho tadā devadatto ahosi.
content.gatha1: Anāvasūraṃ cirarattasaṃsitaṃ, uccāvacaṃucaṃ nīcaṃucaṃ nīcaṃucaṃ nīcaṃ caritamidaṃ purāṇaṃ;
content.gathalast: Vītaddaro vītasoko visallo, sayaṃ abhiññāya abhāsi buddho.
content.gatha1: Ahaṃ vo tena kālena, ahosiṃ tattha bhikkhavo;
content.gathalast: Nāgarājā tadā homi hosiṃ (sī. syā. pī.), evaṃ dhāretha jātakanti.
content.gatha1: Rajjañca paṭipannāsma, ādhipaccaṃ sucīrata;
content.gathalast: Mahattaṃ pattumicchāmi, vijetuṃ pathaviṃ imaṃ.
content.gatha1: Dhammena no adhammena, adhammo me na ruccati;
content.gathalast: Kiccova dhammo carito, rañño hoti sucīrata.
content.gatha1: Idha cevāninditā yena, pecca yena aninditā;
content.gathalast: Yasaṃ devamanussesu, yena pappomupappemupappemu brāhmaṇa.
content.gatha1: Yohaṃ atthañca dhammañca, kattumicchāmi brāhmaṇa;
content.gathalast: Taṃ tvaṃ atthañca dhammañca, brāhmaṇakkhāhi pucchito.
content.gatha1: Nāññatra vidhurā rāja, etadakkhātumarahati;
content.gathalast: Yaṃ tvaṃ atthañca dhammañca, kattumicchasi khattiya.
content.gatha1: Ehi kho pahito gaccha, vidhurassa upantikaṃ;
content.gatha2: nikkhaṃ rattaNikkhañcimaṃnikkhamimaṃ suvaṇṇassa, haraṃ gaccha sucīrata;
content.gathalast: Abhihāraṃ imaṃ dajjā, atthadhammānusiṭṭhiyā.
content.gatha1: Svādhippāgā bhāradvājo, vidhurassa upantikaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tamaddasa mahābrahmā, asamānaṃ sake ghare.
content.gatha1: Raññohaṃ pahito dūto, korabyassa yasassino;
content.gatha2: ‘‘Atthaṃ dhammañca pucchesi’’, iccabravi yudhiṭṭhilo;
content.gathalast: Taṃ tvaṃ atthañca dhammañca, vidhurakkhāhi pucchito.
content.gatha1: Gaṅgaṃ me pidahissanti, na taṃ sakkomi brāhmaṇa;
content.gathalast: Apidhetuṃ mahāsindhuṃ, taṃ kathaṃ so bhavissati.
content.gatha1: Na te sakkomi akkhātuṃ, atthaṃ dhammañca pucchito;
content.gatha2: Bhadrakāro ca me putto, oraso mama atrajo;
content.gathalast: Taṃ tvaṃ atthañca dhammañca, gantvā pucchassu brāhmaṇa.
content.gatha1: Svādhippāgā bhāradvājo, bhadrakārassupantikaṃbhadrakārassa santikaṃbhadrakārassa santikaṃ ;
content.gathalast: Tamaddasa mahābrahmā, nisinnaṃ samhi vesmani.
content.gatha1: Raññohaṃ pahito dūto, korabyassa yasassino;
content.gatha2: ‘‘Atthaṃ dhammañca pucchesi’’, iccabravi yudhiṭṭhilo;
content.gathalast: Taṃ tvaṃ atthañca dhammañca, bhadrakāra pabrūhi bravīhi (sī. pī.) me.
content.gatha1: Maṃsakājaṃmaṃsakācaṃ avahāya, godhaṃ anupatāmahaṃ;
content.gathalast: Na te sakkomi akkhātuṃ, atthaṃ dhammañca pucchito.
content.gatha1: Sañcayosañjayosañjayosañjayo nāma me bhātā, kaniṭṭho me sucīrata;
content.gathalast: Taṃ tvaṃ atthañca dhammañca, gantvā pucchassu brāhmaṇa.
content.gatha1: Svādhippāgā bhāradvājo, sañcayassa upantikaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tamaddasa mahābrahmā, nisinnaṃ samhi vesmani parisati (syā.), parīsati (pī.).
content.gatha1: Raññohaṃ pahito dūto, korabyassa yasassino;
content.gatha2: ‘‘Atthaṃ dhammañca pucchesi’’, iccabravi yudhiṭṭhilo;
content.gathalast: Taṃ tvaṃ atthañca dhammañca, sañcayakkhāhi pucchito.
content.gatha1: Sadā maṃ gilategilatīgilati maccu, sāyaṃ pāto sucīrata;
content.gathalast: Na te sakkomi akkhātuṃ, atthaṃ dhammañca pucchito.
content.gatha1: Sambhavo nāma me bhātā, kaniṭṭho me sucīrata;
content.gathalast: Taṃ tvaṃ atthañca dhammañca, gantvā pucchassu brāhmaṇa.
content.gatha1: Abbhuto vata bho dhammo, nāyaṃ asmāka ruccati;
content.gathalast: Tayo janā pitāputtā, tesu paññāya no vidū.
content.gatha1: Na taṃ sakkotha akkhātuṃ, atthaṃ dhammañca pucchitā;
content.gathalast: Kathaṃ nu daharo jaññā, atthaṃ dhammañca pucchito.
content.gatha1: Mā naṃ daharoti uññāsimaññāsimaññāsi , apucchitvāna sambhavaṃ;
content.gathalast: Pucchitvā sambhavaṃ jaññā, atthaṃ dhammañca brāhmaṇa.
content.gatha1: Yathāpi cando vimalo, gacchaṃ ākāsadhātuyā;
content.gathalast: Sabbe tārāgaṇe loke, ābhāya atirocati.
content.gatha1: Evampi daharūpeto, paññāyogena sambhavo;
content.gatha2: Mā naṃ daharoti uññāsi, apucchitvāna sambhavaṃ;
content.gathalast: Pucchitvā sambhavaṃ jaññā, atthaṃ dhammañca brāhmaṇa.
content.gatha1: Yathāpi rammako māso, gimhānaṃ hoti brāhmaṇa;
content.gathalast: Atevaññehi māsehi, dumapupphehi sobhati.
content.gatha1: Evampi daharūpeto, paññāyogena sambhavo;
content.gatha2: Mā naṃ daharoti uññāsi, apucchitvāna sambhavaṃ;
content.gathalast: Pucchitvā sambhavaṃ jaññā, atthaṃ dhammañca brāhmaṇa.
content.gatha1: Yathāpi himavā brahme, pabbato gandhamādano;
content.gatha2: Nānārukkhehi sañchanno, mahābhūtagaṇālayo;
content.gathalast: Osadhehi ca dibbehi, disā bhāti pavāti ca.
content.gatha1: Evampi daharūpeto, paññāyogena sambhavo;
content.gatha2: Mā naṃ daharoti uññāsi, apucchitvāna sambhavaṃ;
content.gathalast: Pucchitvā sambhavaṃ jaññā, atthaṃ dhammañca brāhmaṇa.
content.gatha1: Yathāpi pāvako brahme, accimālī yasassimā;
content.gathalast: Jalamāno vane gacchecaraṃ kacche , analo kaṇhavattanī.
content.gatha1: Ghatāsano dhūmaketu, uttamāhevanandaho;
content.gathalast: Nisīthenissīvenisive pabbataggasmiṃ, pahūtedho bahutejo (syā. ka.) virocati.
content.gatha1: Evampi daharūpeto, paññāyogena sambhavo;
content.gatha2: Mā naṃ daharoti uññāsi, apucchitvāna sambhavaṃ;
content.gathalast: Pucchitvā sambhavaṃ jaññā, atthaṃ dhammañca brāhmaṇa.
content.gatha1: Javena bhadraṃ jānanti, balibaddañcabalivaddañcabalivaddañca vāhiye;
content.gathalast: Dohena dhenuṃ jānanti, bhāsamānañca paṇḍitaṃ.
content.gatha1: Evampi daharūpeto, paññāyogena sambhavo;
content.gatha2: Mā naṃ daharoti uññāsi, apucchitvāna sambhavaṃ;
content.gathalast: Pucchitvā sambhavaṃ jaññā, atthaṃ dhammañca brāhmaṇa.
content.gatha1: Svādhippāgā bhāradvājo, sambhavassa upantikaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tamaddasa mahābrahmā, kīḷamānaṃ bahīpure.
content.gatha1: Raññohaṃ pahito dūto, korabyassa yasassino;
content.gatha2: ‘‘Atthaṃ dhammañca pucchesi’’, iccabravi yudhiṭṭhilo;
content.gathalast: Taṃ tvaṃ atthañca dhammañca, sambhavakkhāhi pucchito.
content.gatha1: Taggha te ahamakkhissaṃ, yathāpi kusalo tathā;
content.gathalast: Rājā ca kho taṃ jānāti, yadi kāhati vā na vā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ajja suve’’ti saṃseyya, raññā puṭṭho sucīrata;
content.gathalast: Mā katvā avasī rājā, atthe jāte yudhiṭṭhilo.
content.gatha1: Ajjhattaññeva saṃseyya, raññā puṭṭho sucīrata;
content.gathalast: Kummaggaṃ na niveseyya, yathā mūḷho acetasoacetano .
content.gatha1: Attānaṃ nātivatteyya, adhammaṃ na samācare;
content.gathalast: Atitthe nappatāreyya, anatthe na yuto siyā.
content.gatha1: Yo ca etāni ṭhānāni, kattuṃ jānāti khattiyo;
content.gathalast: Sadā so vaḍḍhate rājā, sukkapakkheva candimā.
content.gatha1: Ñātīnañca piyo hoti, mittesu ca virocati;
content.gathalast: Kāyassa bhedā sappañño, saggaṃ so upapajjatīti.
content.gatha1: Bārāṇasyaṃbārāṇassaṃbārāṇassaṃ ahū rājā, kāsīnaṃ raṭṭhavaḍḍhano;
content.gathalast: Mittāmaccaparibyūḷho, agamāsi migājinaṃmigājiraṃmigāciraṃ .
content.gatha1: Tattha brāhmaṇamaddakkhi, setaṃ citraṃ kilāsinaṃ;
content.gathalast: Viddhastaṃ koviḷāraṃva, kisaṃ dhamanisanthataṃ.
content.gatha1: Paramakāruññataṃ pattaṃ, disvā kicchagataṃ naraṃ;
content.gathalast: Avaca byamhito rājā, ‘‘yakkhānaṃ katamo nusi.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Hatthapādā ca te setā, tato setataraṃsetataro siro;
content.gathalast: Gattaṃ kammāsavaṇṇaṃ te, kilāsabahulo casi.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Vaṭṭanāvaḷivaṭṭhanāvali saṅkāsā, piṭṭhi te ninnatunnatā;
content.gathalast: Kāḷapabbāvakāḷapabbā cakāḷā pabbā ca te aṅgā, nāññaṃ passāmi edisaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ugghaṭṭapādo tasito, kiso dhamanisanthato;
content.gathalast: Chāto ātattarūposiādittarūposiatittarūposiatittarūposiatittarūposi , kutosi kattha gacchasi.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Duddasī appakārosi, dubbaṇṇo bhīmadassano;
content.gathalast: Janetti yāpi te mātā, na taṃ iccheyya passituṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kiṃ kammamakaraṃkammamakarākammamakarākammamakarā pubbe, kaṃ avajjhaṃ aghātayi;
content.gathalast: Kibbisaṃ yaṃ karitvāna, idaṃ dukkhaṃ upāgami’’.
content.gatha1: Taggha te ahamakkhissaṃ, yathāpi kusalo tathā;
content.gathalast: Saccavādiñhi lokasmiṃ, pasaṃsantīdha paṇḍitā.
content.gatha1: Eko caraṃ gogaveso, mūḷho accasariṃ vane;
content.gathalast: Araññe irīṇeīriṇeīriṇeīriṇe vivane, nānākuñjarasevite.
content.gatha1: Vāḷamigānucarite, vippanaṭṭhosmi kānane;
content.gathalast: Acariṃ tattha sattāhaṃ, khuppipāsakhuppipāsākhuppipāsā samappito.
content.gatha1: Tattha tindukamaddakkhiṃ, visamaṭṭhaṃ bubhukkhito;
content.gathalast: Papātamabhilambantaṃ, sampannaphaladhārinaṃ.
content.gatha1: Vātassitāni bhakkhesiṃ, tāni rucciṃsu me bhusaṃ;
content.gathalast: Atitto rukkhamārūhiṃ māruyha (sī. syā.), tattha hessāmi āsito.
content.gatha1: Ekaṃ me bhakkhitaṃ āsi, dutiyaṃ abhipatthitaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tato sā bhañjatha sākhā, chinnā pharasunā viya.
content.gatha1: Sohaṃ sahāva sākhāhi, uddhaṃpādo avaṃsiro;
content.gathalast: Appatiṭṭhe anālambe, giriduggasmi pāpataṃ.
content.gatha1: Yasmā ca vāri gambhīraṃ, tasmā na samapajjisaṃsamapajjasiṃsamabhajjisaṃ ;
content.gathalast: Tattha sesiṃ nirānando, anūnā anātho (sī.) dasa rattiyo.
content.gatha1: Athettha kapi māgañchimāgacchimāgacchi , gonaṅgulo darīcaro;
content.gathalast: Sākhāhi sākhaṃ vicaranto, khādamāno dumapphalaṃ.
content.gatha1: So maṃ disvā kisaṃ paṇḍuṃ, kāruññamakaraṃ mayi;
content.gathalast: Ambho ko nāma so ettha, evaṃ dukkhena aṭṭito.
content.gatha1: Manusso amanusso vā, attānaṃ me pavedaya;
content.gathalast: Tassañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā, idaṃ vacanamabraviṃ.
content.gatha1: Manussohaṃ byasampattovasampattovasampatto , sā me natthi ito gati;
content.gathalast: Taṃ vo vadāmi bhaddaṃ vo, tvañca me saraṇaṃ bhava.
content.gatha1: Garuṃgarugaru silaṃ gahetvāna, vicarīvicari pabbate kapi;
content.gathalast: Silāya yoggaṃ katvāna, nisabho etadabravi.
content.gatha1: Ehi me piṭṭhimāruyha, gīvaṃ gaṇhāhi bāhubhi;
content.gathalast: Ahaṃ taṃ uddharissāmi, giriduggata vegasā.
content.gatha1: Tassa taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā, vānarindassa sirīmato;
content.gathalast: Piṭṭhimāruyha dhīrassa, gīvaṃ bāhāhi aggahiṃ.
content.gatha1: So maṃ tato samuṭṭhāsi, tejassītejasītejasītejasī balavā kapi;
content.gathalast: Vihaññamāno kicchena, giriduggata vegasā.
content.gatha1: Uddharitvāna maṃ santo, nisabho etadabravi;
content.gathalast: Iṅgha maṃ samma rakkhassu, passupissaṃ muhuttakaṃ.
content.gatha1: Sīhā byagghā ca dīpī ca, acchakokataracchayo;
content.gathalast: Te maṃ pamattaṃ hiṃseyyuṃ, te tvaṃ disvā nivārayadisvāna vāraya .
content.gatha1: Evaṃ me parittātūnaparittātuna , passupi so muhuttakaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tadāhaṃ pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ, paṭilacchiṃ ayoniso.
content.gatha1: Bhakkho ayaṃ manussānaṃ, yathā caññe vane migā;
content.gathalast: Yaṃ nūnimaṃ vadhitvāna, chāto khādeyya vānaraṃ.
content.gatha1: Asitoāsiko ca gamissāmi, maṃsamādāya sambalaṃ;
content.gathalast: Kantāraṃ nittharissāmi, pātheyyaṃ me bhavissati.
content.gatha1: Tato silaṃ gahetvāna, matthakaṃ sannitāḷayiṃ;
content.gathalast: Mama gattabhattabhattahattha kilantassa, pahāro dubbalo ahu.
content.gatha1: So ca vegenudappatto, kapi ruhirarudhira makkhito;
content.gathalast: Assupuṇṇehi nettehi, rodanto maṃ udikkhati.
content.gatha1: Māyyomaṃ kari bhaddante, tvañca nāmedisaṃ kari;
content.gathalast: Tvañca kho nāma dīghāvudīghāyu , aññeaññaṃ vāretumarahasi.
content.gatha1: Aho vata re purisa, tāva dukkarakāraka;
content.gathalast: Edisā visamā duggā, papātā uddhatouddhaṭo mayā.
content.gatha1: Ānīto paralokāva, dubbheyyaṃ maṃ amaññatha;
content.gathalast: Taṃ tena pāpadhammena, pāpaṃ pāpena cintitaṃ.
content.gatha1: Mā heva tvaṃ adhammaṭṭha, vedanaṃ kaṭukaṃ phusi;
content.gathalast: Mā heva pāpakammaṃ taṃ, phalaṃ veḷuṃva taṃ vadhi.
content.gatha1: Tayime natthi vissāso, pāpadhamma asaññatapāpadhammaṃ amaññatha ;
content.gathalast: Ehi me piṭṭhito gaccha, dissamānova santike.
content.gatha1: Muttosi hatthā vāḷānaṃ, pattosi mānusiṃ padaṃ;
content.gathalast: Esa maggo adhammaṭṭha, tena gaccha yathāsukhaṃ.
content.gatha1: Idaṃ vatvā giricaro, rahade ruhiraṃ (syā. ka.) pakkhalya matthakaṃ;
content.gathalast: Assūni sampamajjitvā, tato pabbatamāruhi.
content.gatha1: Sohaṃ tenābhisattosmi, pariḷāhena aṭṭito;
content.gathalast: Ḍayhamānena gattena, vāriṃ pātuṃ upāgamiṃ.
content.gatha1: Agginā viya santatto, rahado ruhiramakkhito;
content.gathalast: Pubbalohitasaṅkāso, sabbo me samapajjatha.
content.gatha1: Yāvanto udabindūni, kāyasmiṃ nipatiṃsu me;
content.gathalast: Tāvanto gaṇḍagaṇḍūgaṇḍūgaṇḍu jāyetha, addhabeluvasādisā.
content.gatha1: Pabhinnā pagghariṃsu me, kuṇapā pubbalohitā;
content.gathalast: Yena yeneva gacchāmi, gāmesu nigamesu ca.
content.gatha1: Daṇḍahatthā nivārenti, itthiyo purisā ca maṃ;
content.gathalast: Okkitāokiṇṇā pūtigandhena, māssu orena āgamāmāgamāmāgamā .
content.gatha1: Etādisaṃ idaṃ dukkhaṃ, satta vassāni dāni me;
content.gathalast: Anubhomi sakaṃ kammaṃ, pubbe dukkaṭamattano.
content.gatha1: Taṃ vo vadāmi bhaddantebhaddaṃ vobhaddaṃ vo , yāvantettha samāgatā;
content.gathalast: Māssu mittānamittānaṃmittānaṃ dubbhittho, mittadubbho hi pāpako.
content.gatha1: Kuṭṭhī kilāsī bhavati, yo mittānaṃ idhaddubhiyo mittānaṃ idhaddubhiyo mittānidha dubbhatiyo mittānaṃ idha dubbhati ;
content.gathalast: Kāyassa bhedā mittaddumittadubbhīmittadubbhī , nirayaṃ sopapajjatītiso upapajjatītiso upapajjatītiso upapajjatīti .
content.gatha1: Sace vo vuyhamānānaṃ, sattannaṃ udakaṇṇave;
content.gatha2: Manussabalimesāno, nāvaṃ gaṇheyya rakkhaso;
content.gathalast: Anupubbaṃ kathaṃ datvā, muñcesi dakarakkhasādakarakkhato .
content.gatha1: Mātaraṃ paṭhamaṃ dajjaṃ, bhariyaṃ datvāna bhātaraṃ;
content.gatha2: Tato sahāyaṃ datvāna, pañcamaṃ dajjaṃdajja brāhmaṇaṃ;
content.gathalast: Chaṭṭhāhaṃ dajjamattānaṃ, neva dajjaṃ mahosadhaṃ.
content.gatha1: Posetā te janettī ca, dīgharattānukampikā;
content.gatha2: Chabbhī tayi padussati paduṭṭhasmiṃ (sī. syā.), paṇḍitā atthadassinī;
content.gathalast: Aññaṃ upanisaṃ katvā, vadhā taṃ parimocayi.
content.gatha1: Taṃ tādisiṃtādisaṃ pāṇadadiṃ, orasaṃ gabbhadhāriniṃgabbhadhāriṇiṃgabbhadhāriṇiṃ ;
content.gathalast: Mātaraṃ kena dosena, dajjāsi dakarakkhinodakarakkhato .
content.gatha1: Daharā viyalaṅkāraṃ, dhāreti apiḷandhanaṃ;
content.gathalast: Dovārike anīkaṭṭhe, ativelaṃ pajagghatisañjagghati .
content.gatha1: Athopi paṭirājūnaṃ, sayaṃ dūtāni sāsati;
content.gathalast: Mātaraṃ tena dosena, dajjāhaṃ dakarakkhino.
content.gatha1: Itthigumbassa pavarā, accantaṃ piyabhāṇinī accantapiyavādinī (sī. pī.);
content.gathalast: Anuggatāanubbatāanupubbatā sīlavatī, chāyāva anapāyinī.
content.gatha1: Akkodhanā puññavatīpaññavatīpaññavatī , paṇḍitā atthadassinī;
content.gathalast: Ubbariṃuppariṃ kena dosena, dajjāsi dakarakkhino.
content.gatha1: Khiḍḍāratisamāpannaṃ, anatthavasamāgataṃ;
content.gathalast: Sā maṃ sakāna puttānaṃ, ayācaṃ yācate dhanaṃ.
content.gatha1: Sohaṃ dadāmi sārattosārato , bahuṃ uccāvacaṃ dhanaṃ;
content.gatha2: Suduccajaṃ cajitvāna, pacchā socāmi dummano;
content.gathalast: Ubbariṃ tena dosena, dajjāhaṃ dakarakkhino.
content.gatha1: Yenocitā janapadājānapadājānapadājānapadā , ānītā ca paṭiggahaṃ;
content.gathalast: Ābhataṃ pararajjebhi, abhiṭṭhāya bahuṃ dhanaṃ.
content.gatha1: Dhanuggahānaṃ pavaraṃ, sūraṃ tikhiṇamantinaṃ;
content.gathalast: Bhātaraṃ kena dosena, dajjāsi dakarakkhino.
content.gatha1: Yenocitāmayocitāmayācitā janapadā, ānītā ca paṭiggahaṃ;
content.gathalast: Ābhataṃ pararajjebhi, abhiṭṭhāya bahuṃ dhanaṃ.
content.gatha1: Dhanuggahānaṃ pavaro, sūro tikhiṇamanti ca tikhiṇamantino (ka.);
content.gathalast: Mayāyaṃmayā somayā so sukhito rājā, atimaññati dārako.
content.gatha1: Upaṭṭhānampi me ayye, na so eti yathā pure;
content.gathalast: Bhātaraṃ tena dosena, dajjāhaṃ dakarakkhino.
content.gatha1: Ekarattena ubhayo, tvañceva dhanusekha ca dhanusekhavā (sī. syā. pī.);
content.gathalast: Ubho jātettha pañcālā, sahāyā susamāvayā.
content.gatha1: Cariyā taṃ anubandhitthoanubandho , ekadukkhasukho tava;
content.gatha2: Ussukko te divārattiṃ, sabbakiccesu byāvaṭo;
content.gathalast: Sahāyaṃ kena dosena, dajjāsi dakarakkhino.
content.gatha1: Cariyā maṃ ayaṃcariyāya ayaṃcariyāya ayaṃ ayye, pajagghitthosañjagghittho mayā saha;
content.gathalast: Ajjāpi tena vaṇṇena, ativelaṃ pajagghati.
content.gatha1: Ubbariyāpihaṃ ayye, mantayāmi rahogato;
content.gathalast: Anāmantoanāmantā pavisati, pubbe appaṭivedito.
content.gatha1: Laddhadvāroladdhavāroladdhavāro katokāso, ahirikaṃ anādaraṃ;
content.gathalast: Sahāyaṃ tena dosena, dajjāhaṃ dakarakkhino.
content.gatha1: Kusalo sabbanimittānaṃ, rutaññūrudaññūrudaññūrudaññū āgatāgamo;
content.gathalast: Uppāte supine yutto, niyyāne ca pavesane.
content.gatha1: Paṭṭhopaddhopaddho bhūmantalikkhasmiṃ, nakkhattapadakovido;
content.gathalast: Brāhmaṇaṃ kena dosena, dajjāsi dakarakkhino.
content.gatha1: Parisāyampi me ayye, ummīlitvā udikkhati;
content.gathalast: Tasmā accabhamuṃ luddaṃ, dajjāhaṃ dakarakkhino.
content.gatha1: Sasamuddapariyāyaṃ , mahiṃ sāgarakuṇḍalaṃ;
content.gathalast: Vasundharaṃ āvasasi, amaccaparivārito.
content.gatha1: Cāturanto mahāraṭṭho, vijitāvī mahabbalo;
content.gathalast: Pathabyā ekarājāsi, yaso te vipulaṃ gato.
content.gatha1: Soḷasitthisahassāni, āmuttamaṇikuṇḍalā;
content.gathalast: Nānājanapadā nārī, devakaññūpamā subhā.
content.gatha1: Evaṃ sabbaṅgasampannaṃ, sabbakāmasamiddhinaṃ;
content.gathalast: Sukhitānaṃ piyaṃ dīghaṃ, jīvitaṃ āhu khattiya.
content.gatha1: Atha tvaṃ kena vaṇṇena, kena vā pana hetunā;
content.gathalast: Paṇḍitaṃ anurakkhanto, pāṇaṃ cajasi duccajaṃ.
content.gatha1: Yatopi āgato ayye, mama hatthaṃ mahosadho;
content.gathalast: Nābhijānāmi dhīrassa, anumattampi dukkaṭaṃ.
content.gatha1: Sace ca kismici kāle, maraṇaṃ me pure siyā;
content.gathalast: So me putte putte ca me (sī. syā. pī. paputte ca, sukhāpeyya mahosadho.
content.gatha1: Anāgataṃ paccuppannaṃ, sabbamatthampi passatisabbamatthaṃ vipassatisabbamatthaṃ vipassatisabbamatthaṃ vipassati ;
content.gathalast: Anāparādhakammantaṃ, na dajjaṃ dakarakkhino.
content.gatha1: Idaṃ suṇātha pañcālā, cūḷaneyyassacūḷanīyassa bhāsitaṃ;
content.gathalast: Paṇḍitaṃ anurakkhanto, pāṇaṃ cajati duccajaṃ.
content.gatha1: Mātu bhariyāya bhātucca, sakhino brāhmaṇassa ca;
content.gathalast: Attano cāpi pañcālo, channaṃ cajati jīvitaṃ.
content.gatha1: Evaṃ khahiddhiyāmahatthikāmahiddhikā paññā, nipuṇā sādhucintinī;
content.gathalast: Diṭṭhadhammahitatthāya, samparāyasukhāya cāti.
content.gatha1: Vikiṇṇavācaṃ aniguyhaanigūḷha mantaṃ, asaññataṃ aparicakkhitāraṃaparirakkhitāraṃ ;
content.gathalast: Bhayaṃ tamanveti sayaṃ abodhaṃ, nāgaṃ yathā paṇḍarakaṃ supaṇṇosuvaṇṇo .
content.gatha1: Yo guyhamantaṃ parirakkhaneyyaṃ, mohā naro saṃsati hāsamānobhāsamāno ;
content.gathalast: Taṃ bhinnamantaṃ bhayamanveti khippaṃ, nāgaṃ yathā paṇḍarakaṃ supaṇṇo.
content.gatha1: Nānumitto garuṃ atthaṃ, guyhaṃ veditumarahati;
content.gathalast: Sumitto ca asambuddhaṃ, sambuddhaṃ vā anattha vā.
content.gatha1: Vissāsamāpajjimahaṃ acelaṃaceloacelo , samaṇo ayaṃ sammato bhāvitatto;
content.gathalast: Tassāhamakkhiṃ vivariṃvivaraṃ guyhamatthaṃ, atītamattho kapaṇaṃkapaṇo rudāmi.
content.gatha1: Tassāhaṃ paramaṃpurimaṃ brahme guyhaṃ, vācañhi maṃ nāsakkhiṃnāsakkhi saṃyametuṃ;
content.gathalast: Tappakkhato hi bhayamāgataṃ mamaṃ, atītamattho kapaṇaṃ rudāmi.
content.gatha1: Yo ve naro suhadaṃ maññamāno, guyhamatthaṃ saṃsati dukkulīne;
content.gathalast: Dosā bhayā athavā rāgarattārāgarattorāgarattorāgaratto , pallatthitopallitthopallattito bālo asaṃsayaṃ so.
content.gatha1: Tirokkhavāco asataṃ paviṭṭho, yo saṅgatīsu mudīreti vākyaṃ;
content.gathalast: Āsīviso dummukhotyāhu taṃ naraṃ, ārā ārāārā arā saṃyame tādisamhā.
content.gatha1: Annaṃ pānaṃ kāsikakāsikaṃ candanañca, manāpitthiyo mālamucchādanañca;
content.gathalast: Ohāya gacchāmase sabbakāme, supaṇṇa pāṇūpagatāva tyamhā.
content.gatha1: Ko nīdha tiṇṇaṃ garahaṃ upeti, asmiṃdha loke pāṇabhū nāgarāja;
content.gathalast: Samaṇo supaṇṇo atha vā tvameva, kiṃ kāraṇā paṇḍarakaggahīto.
content.gatha1: Samaṇoti me sammatatto ahosi, piyo ca me manasā bhāvitatto;
content.gathalast: Tassāhamakkhiṃ vivariṃ guyhamatthaṃ, atītamattho kapaṇaṃ rudāmi.
content.gatha1: Na catthi satto amaro pathabyā, paññāvidhā natthi na ninditabbā;
content.paragraph: Saccena dhammena dhitiyādhiyādhiyā damena, alabbhamabyāharatī naro idha.
content.gatha1: Mātāpitā paramā bandhavānaṃ, nāssa tatiyo anukampakatthi;
content.gathalast: Tesampi guyhaṃ paramaṃ na saṃse, mantassa bhedaṃ parisaṅkamāno.
content.gatha1: Mātāpitā bhaginī bhātaro ca, sahāyā vā yassa honti sapakkhā;
content.gathalast: Tesampi guyhaṃ paramaṃ na saṃse, mantassa bhedaṃ parisaṅkamāno.
content.gatha1: Bhariyā ce purisaṃ vajjā, komārī piyabhāṇinī;
content.gatha2: Puttarūpayasūpetā , ñātisaṅghapurakkhatā, tassāpi guyhaṃ paramaṃ na saṃse;
content.gathalast: Mantassa bhedaṃ parisaṅkamāno.
content.gatha1: Na guyhamatthaṃguyhatthaṃ vivareyya, rakkheyya naṃ yathā nidhiṃ;
content.gathalast: Na hi pātukato sādhu, guyho attho pajānatā.
content.gatha1: Thiyā guyhaṃ na saṃseyya, amittassa ca paṇḍito;
content.gathalast: Yo cāmisena saṃhīro, hadayattheno ca yo naro.
content.gatha1: Guyhamatthaṃ asambuddhaṃ, sambodhayati yo naro;
content.gathalast: Mantabhedabhayā tassa, dāsabhūto titikkhati.
content.gatha1: Yāvanto purisassatthaṃ, guyhaṃ jānanti mantinaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tāvanto tassa ubbegā, tasmā guyhaṃ na vissaje.
content.gatha1: Vivicca bhāseyya divā rahassaṃ, rattiṃ giraṃ nātivelaṃ pamuñce;
content.gathalast: Upassutikā hi suṇanti mantaṃ, tasmā manto khippamupeti bhedaṃ.
content.gatha1: Yathāpi ayoassaaya nagaraṃ mahantaṃ, advārakaṃāḷārakaṃ āyasaṃ bhaddasālaṃ;
content.gathalast: Samantakhātāparikhāupetaṃ, evampi me te idha guyhamantā.
content.gatha1: Ye guyhamantā avikiṇṇavācā, daḷhā sadatthesu narā dujivhadujivhādujivhā ;
content.gathalast: Ārā amittā byavajanti tehi, āsīvisā vā riva sattusaṅghāsattasaṅghāsattasaṅghā .
content.gatha1: Hitvā gharaṃ pabbajito acelo, naggo muṇḍo carati ghāsahetu;
content.gathalast: Tamhitamhī nu kho vivariṃ guyhamatthaṃ, atthā ca dhammā ca apaggatamhāapāgatamhāapagatamhāavāgatamhā .
content.gatha1: Kathaṃkaro hoti supaṇṇarāja, kiṃsīlo kena vatena vattaṃ;
content.gathalast: Samaṇo caraṃ hitvā mamāyitāni, kathaṃkaro saggamupeti ṭhānaṃ.
content.gatha1: Hiriyā titikkhāya damenupeto damena khantiyā (sī. syā. pī.), akkodhano pesuṇiyaṃ pahāya;
content.gathalast: Samaṇo caraṃ hitvā mamāyitāni, evaṃkaro saggamupeti ṭhānaṃ.
content.gatha1: Mātāva puttaṃ taruṇaṃ tanujjaṃtanūjaṃ , samphassatā sampassa taṃ (sī. pī.) sabbagattaṃ phareti;
content.gathalast: Evampi me tvaṃ pāturahu dijinda, mātāva puttaṃ anukampamāno.
content.gatha1: Handajja tvaṃ muñcamucca vadhā dujivha, tayo hi puttā na hi añño atthi;
content.gathalast: Antevāsī dinnako atrajo ca, rajjassurajassurajassurajassu puttaññataro me ahosi.
content.gatha1: Icceva vākyaṃ visajjī supaṇṇo, bhumyaṃ patiṭṭhāya dijo dujivhaṃ;
content.gathalast: Muttajja tvaṃ sabbabhayātivatto, thalūdake hohi mayābhigutto.
content.gatha1: Ātaṅkinaṃ yathā kusalo bhisakko, pipāsitānaṃ rahadova sīto;
content.gathalast: Vesmaṃ yathā himasītaṭṭitānaṃhimasisiraṭṭitānaṃ , evampi te saraṇamahaṃ bhavāmi.
content.gatha1: Sandhiṃ katvā amittena, aṇḍajena jalābuja;
content.gathalast: Vivariya dāṭhaṃ sesi, kuto taṃ bhayamāgataṃ.
content.gatha1: Saṅketheva amittasmiṃ, mittasmimpi na vissase;
content.gathalast: Abhayā bhayamuppannaṃ, api mūlāni kantati.
content.gatha1: Kathaṃ nu vissase tyamhi, yenāsi kalaho kato;
content.gathalast: Niccayattena ṭhātabbaṃ, so disabbhiso disamhi na rajjati.
content.gatha1: Vissāsaye na ca taṃnaṃnaṃnaṃ vissayeyya, asaṅkito saṅkito ca bhaveyya;
content.gathalast: Tathā tathā viññū parakkameyya, yathā yathā bhāvaṃ paro na jaññā.
content.gatha1: Te devavaṇṇādevavaṇṇī sukhumālarūpā, ubho samā sujayāsujayosujayosujayo puññakhandhāpuññagandhā ;
content.gathalast: Upāgamuṃ karampiyaṃkādambiyaṃkārambiyaṃ acelaṃ, missībhūtā assavāhāva nāgā.
content.gatha1: Tato have paṇḍarako acelaṃ, sayamevupāgamma idaṃ avoca;
content.gathalast: Muttajjahaṃ sabbabhayātivatto, na hi ha (pī.) nūna tuyhaṃ manaso piyamhā.
content.gatha1: Piyo hi me āsi supaṇṇarājā, asaṃsayaṃ paṇḍarakena saccaṃ;
content.gathalast: So rāgarattova akāsimetaṃ, pāpakammaṃpāpaṃ kammaṃpāpaṃ kammaṃ sampajāno na mohā.
content.gatha1: Na me piyaṃ appiyaṃ vāpi hoti, sampassato lokamimaṃ parañca;
content.gathalast: Susaññatānañhi viyañjanena, asaññato lokamimaṃ carāsi.
content.gatha1: Ariyāvakāsosi anariyovāsianariyo cāsianariyo cāsi , asaññato saññatasannikāso;
content.gathalast: Kaṇhābhijātikosi anariyarūpo, pāpaṃ bahuṃ duccaritaṃ acāri.
content.gatha1: Aduṭṭhassa tuvaṃ dubbhi, dubbhīdūbhi, dūbhī ca pisuṇo casi;
content.gathalast: Etena saccavajjena, muddhā te phalatu sattadhā.
content.gatha1: Tasmā hi mittānaṃ na dubbhitabbaṃ, mittadubbhāmittadubbhā hi pāpiyo natthi añño;
content.gathalast: Āsittasatto nihato pathabyā, indassa vākyena hi saṃvaro hatoti.
content.gatha1: Kā vedhamānā girikandarāyaṃ, ekā tuvaṃ tiṭṭhasi saññatūrasaññatūrasaṃhitūrusañcitūru ;
content.gathalast: Puṭṭhāsi me pāṇipameyyamajjhe, akkhāhi me nāmañca bandhave ca.
content.gatha1: Obhāsayaṃ vanaṃ rammaṃ, sīhabyagghanisevitaṃ;
content.gatha2: Kā vā tvamasi kalyāṇi, kassa vā tvaṃ sumajjhime;
content.gathalast: Abhivādemi taṃ bhadde, dānavāhaṃ namatthu te.
content.gatha1: Yo putto kāsirājassa, sotthisenoti taṃ vidū;
content.gatha2: Tassāhaṃ sambulā bhariyā, evaṃ jānāhi dānava;
content.gathalast: Abhivādemi taṃ bhantebhaddantebhaddante , sambulāhaṃ namatthu te.
content.gatha1: Vedehaputto bhaddante, vane vasati āturo;
content.gathalast: Tamahaṃ rogasammattaṃ, ekā ekaṃ upaṭṭhahaṃupaṭṭhahiṃ .
content.gatha1: Ahañca vanamuñchāya, madhumaṃsaṃ migābilaṃmigāvilaṃ ;
content.gathalast: Yadā harāmi taṃ bhakkho, tassa nūnajja nādhatināthati .
content.gatha1: Kiṃ vane rājaputtena, āturena karissasi;
content.gathalast: Sambule pariciṇṇena, ahaṃ bhattā bhavāmi te.
content.gatha1: Sokaṭṭāya durattāya, kiṃ rūpaṃ vijjate mama;
content.gathalast: Aññaṃ pariyesa bhaddante, abhirūpataraṃ mayā.
content.gatha1: Ehimaṃ girimāruyha, bhariyā me mayhaṃ (sī. syā. pī.) catussatā;
content.gathalast: Tāsaṃ tvaṃ pavarā hohi, sabbakāmasamiddhinī.
content.gatha1: Nūna nanu (sī. syā. pī. ka.) tārakavaṇṇābhehāṭakavaṇṇābhe , yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi;
content.gathalast: Sabbaṃ taṃ pacuraṃ mayhaṃ, ramassvajjaramasujjaramasujja mayā saha.
content.gatha1: No ce tuvaṃ maheseyyaṃ, sambule kārayissasi;
content.gathalast: Alaṃ tvaṃ pātarāsāya, paṇhe maññe (sī. pī.) bhakkhā bhavissasi.
content.gatha1: Tañca sattajaṭo luddo, kaḷāro purisādako;
content.gathalast: Vane nāthaṃ apassantiṃ, sambulaṃ aggahī bhuje.
content.gatha1: Adhipannā pisācena, luddenāmisacakkhunā;
content.gathalast: Sā ca sattuvasampattā, patimevānusocati.
content.gatha1: Na me idaṃ tathā dukkhaṃ, yaṃ maṃ khādeyya rakkhaso;
content.gathalast: Yañca me ayyaputtassa, mano hessati aññathā.
content.gatha1: Na santi devā pavasanti nūna, na hi nūna santi idha lokapālā;
content.gathalast: Sahasā karontānamasaññatānaṃ, na hi nūna santi paṭisedhitāro.
content.gatha1: Itthīnamesā pavarā yasassinī, santā samā aggirivuggatejā;
content.gatha2: Tañce tuvaṃ rakkhasādesi kaññaṃ, muddhā ca hi sattadhā te phaleyya;
content.gathalast: Mā tvaṃ dahījahī muñca patibbatāyapatibbatā sāpatibbatā yā .
content.gatha1: Sā ca assamamāgacchi, pamuttā purisādakā;
content.gathalast: Nīḷaṃniḍḍaṃniḍḍaṃ paḷinaṃ sakuṇīvaphalinasakuṇīvaphalinasakuṇīvaphalinasakuṇīva , gatasiṅgaṃva ālayaṃ.
content.gatha1: Sā tattha paridevesi, rājaputtī yasassinī;
content.gathalast: Sambulā utumattakkhā, vane nāthaṃ apassantīapassatī .
content.gatha1: Samaṇe brāhmaṇe vande, sampannacaraṇe ise;
content.gathalast: Rājaputtaṃ apassantī, tumhaṃmhitumhaṃ hi saraṇaṃ gatā.
content.gatha1: Vande sīhe ca byagghe ca, ye ca aññe vane migā;
content.gathalast: Rājaputtaṃ apassantī, tumhaṃmhi saraṇaṃ gatā.
content.gatha1: Tiṇātiṇa latāni osadhyo, pabbatāni vanāni ca;
content.gathalast: Rājaputtaṃ apassantī, tumhaṃmhi saraṇaṃ gatā.
content.gatha1: Vande indīvarīsāmaṃ, rattiṃ nakkhattamāliniṃ;
content.gathalast: Rājaputtaṃ apassantī, tumhaṃmhi saraṇaṃ gatā.
content.gatha1: Vande bhāgīrathiṃ gaṅgaṃ, savantīnaṃ paṭiggahaṃ;
content.gathalast: Rājaputtaṃ apassantī, tumhaṃmhi saraṇaṃ gatā.
content.gatha1: Vande ahaṃ pabbatarājaseṭṭhaṃ, himavantaṃ siluccayaṃ;
content.gathalast: Rājaputtaṃ apassantī, tumhaṃmhi saraṇaṃ gatā.
content.gatha1: Atisāyaṃ vatāgacchi, rājaputti yasassini;
content.gathalast: Kena nujja samāgacchisamāgacchisamāgacchi , ko te piyataro mayā.
content.gatha1: Idaṃ khohaṃ tadāvocaṃtadavocaṃtadavocaṃ , gahitā tena sattunā;
content.gatha2: Na me idaṃ tathā dukkhaṃ, yaṃ maṃ khādeyya rakkhaso;
content.gathalast: Yañca me ayyaputtassa, mano hessati aññathā.
content.gatha1: Corīnaṃ bahubuddhīnaṃ, yāsu saccaṃ sudullabhaṃ;
content.gathalast: Thīnaṃ bhāvo durājāno, macchassevodake gataṃ.
content.gatha1: Tathā maṃ saccaṃ pāletu, pālayissati ce mamaṃ;
content.gatha2: Yathāhaṃ nābhijānāmi, aññaṃ piyataraṃ tayā;
content.gathalast: Etena saccavajjena, byādhi te vūpasammatu.
content.gatha1: Ye kuñjarā sattasatā uḷārā, rakkhanti rattindivamuyyutāvudhā;
content.gathalast: Dhanuggahānañca satāni soḷasa, kathaṃvidhe passasi bhadde sattavo.
content.gatha1: Alaṅkatāyo padumuttarattacā, virāgitā passati haṃsagaggarā;
content.gathalast: Tāsaṃ suṇitvā mitagītavāditaṃmitagītavādinaṃ , na dāni me tāta tathā yathā pure.
content.gatha1: Suvaṇṇasaṃkaccadharā suviggahā, alaṅkatā mānusiyaccharūpamā;
content.gathalast: Senopiyāsenūpiyā tāta aninditaṅgiyo, khattiyakaññā paṭilobhayantipaṭilābhayanti naṃ.
content.gatha1: Sace ahaṃ tāta tathā yathā pure, patiṃ tamuñchāya punā vane bhare;
content.gathalast: Sammānaye maṃ na ca maṃ vimānaye, itopi me tāta tato varaṃ siyā.
content.gatha1: Yamannapāne vipulasmi ohite, nārī vimaṭṭhābharaṇā alaṅkatā;
content.gathalast: Sabbaṅgupetāpañcaṅgupetāpañcaṅgupetāpañcaṅgupetā patino ca appiyā, abajjhaavajjhaābajjha tassā maraṇaṃ tato varaṃ.
content.gatha1: Api ce daliddā kapaṇā anāḷhiyā, kaṭādutīyā patino ca sā piyā;
content.gathalast: Sabbaṅgupetāyapi appiyāya, ayameva seyyāseyyoseyyo kapaṇāpi yā piyākapaṇāpi yā .
content.gatha1: Sudullabhitthī purisassa yā hitā, bhattitthiyā dullabho yo hito ca;
content.gathalast: Hitā ca te sīlavatī ca bhariyā, janinda dhammaṃ cara sambulāya.
content.gatha1: Sace tuvaṃ vipule laddhabhoge, issāvatiṇṇā maraṇaṃ upesi;
content.gathalast: Ahañca te bhadde imā rājakaññāimā ca kaññā , sabbesabbevasabbevasabbeva te vacanakarā bhavāmāti.
content.gatha1: Appamādo amataṃ padaṃamatapadaṃamatapadaṃ , pamādo maccuno padaṃ;
content.gathalast: Appamattā na mīyanti, ye pamattā yathā matā.
content.gatha1: Madā pamādo jāyetha, pamādā jāyate khayo;
content.gathalast: Khayā padosākhayā ca dosā jāyanti, mā pamādomā madomā madomā mado bharatūsabhabhāradhūsabha .
content.gatha1: Bahū hi khattiyā jīnā, atthaṃ raṭṭhaṃ pamādino;
content.gathalast: Athopi gāmino gāmā, anagārā agārino.
content.gatha1: Khattiyassa pamattassa, raṭṭhasmiṃ raṭṭhavaḍḍhana;
content.gathalast: Sabbe bhogā vinassanti, rañño taṃ vuccate aghaṃ.
content.gatha1: Nesa dhammo mahārāja, ativelaṃ pamajjasi;
content.gathalast: Iddhaṃ phītaṃ janapadaṃ, corā viddhaṃsayanti naṃ.
content.gatha1: Na te puttā bhavissanti, na hiraññaṃ na dhāniyaṃ na hiraññanidhāniyā (ka.);
content.gathalast: Raṭṭhe viluppamānamhi, sabbabhogehi jiyyasi.
content.gatha1: Sabbabhogā parijiṇṇaṃ, rājānaṃ vāpi khattiyaṃkhattiya ;
content.gathalast: Ñātimittā suhajjā ca, na taṃ maññanti māniyaṃmantiyaṃ .
content.gatha1: Hatthārohā anīkaṭṭhā, rathikā pattikārakā;
content.gathalast: Tamevamupajīvantā, na taṃ maññanti māniyaṃ.
content.gatha1: Asaṃvihitakammantaṃ, bālaṃ dummantimantinaṃ;
content.gathalast: Sirī jahati dummedhaṃ, jiṇṇaṃva urago tacaṃ.
content.gatha1: Susaṃvihitakammantaṃ , kāluṭṭhāyiṃ atanditaṃ;
content.gathalast: Sabbe bhogābhivaḍḍhanti, gāvo sausabhāmiva.
content.gatha1: Upassutiṃ mahārāja, raṭṭhe janapade cara;
content.gathalast: Tattha disvā ca sutvā ca, tato taṃtvaṃ paṭipajjasi.
content.gatha1: Evaṃ vedetu pañcālo, saṅgāme saramappitosamappitosamappito ;
content.gathalast: Yathāhamajja vedemi, kaṇṭakena samappito.
content.gatha1: Jiṇṇo dubbalacakkhūsi, na rūpaṃ sādhu passasi;
content.gathalast: Kiṃ tattha brahmadattassa, yaṃ taṃ maggeyyamaggheyya kaṇṭakokaṇḍakokaṇḍakokaṇḍako .
content.gatha1: Bahvettha brahmadattassa, sohaṃyohaṃyohaṃyohaṃ maggasmimaggosmi brāhmaṇa;
content.gathalast: Arakkhitā jānapadā, adhammabalinā hatā.
content.gatha1: Rattiñhirattiñca corā khādanti, divā khādanti tuṇḍiyā;
content.gathalast: Raṭṭhasmiṃ kūṭarājassa, bahu adhammiko jano.
content.gatha1: Etādise bhaye jāte tāta (sī. pī.), bhayaṭṭā tātatāvatāva māṇavā;
content.gathalast: Nillenakāni kubbanti, vane āhatva kaṇṭakaṃ.
content.gatha1: Kadāssu nāmayaṃ rājā, brahmadatto marissati;
content.gathalast: Yassa raṭṭhamhi jiyyanti, appatikā kumārikā.
content.gatha1: Dubbhāsitañhi te jammi, anatthapadakovide;
content.gathalast: Kuhiṃ rājā kumārīnaṃ, bhattāraṃ pariyesati.
content.gatha1: Na me dubbhāsitaṃ brahme, kovidatthapadā ahaṃ;
content.gathalast: Arakkhitā jānapadā, adhammabalinā hatā.
content.gatha1: Rattiñhi corā khādanti, divā khādanti tuṇḍiyā;
content.gatha2: Raṭṭhasmiṃ kūṭarājassa, bahu adhammiko jano;
content.gathalast: Dujjīve dubbhare dāre, kuto bhattā kumāriyo.
content.gatha1: Evaṃ sayatu pañcālo, saṅgāme sattiyā hato;
content.gathalast: Yathāyaṃ kapaṇo seti, hato phālena sāliyo.
content.gatha1: Adhammena tuvaṃ jamma, brahmadattassa kujjhasi;
content.gathalast: Yo tvaṃ sapasi rājānaṃ, aparajjhitvāna attanoattanā .
content.gatha1: Dhammena brahmadattassa, ahaṃ kujjhāmi brāhmaṇa;
content.gathalast: Arakkhitā jānapadā, adhammabalinā hatā.
content.gatha1: Rattiñhi corā khādanti, divā khādanti tuṇḍiyā;
content.gathalast: Raṭṭhasmiṃ kūṭarājassa, bahu adhammiko jano.
content.gatha1: Sā nūna puna re pakkā, vikāle bhattamāhari;
content.gathalast: Bhattahāriṃ apekkhanto, hato phālena sāliyo.
content.gatha1: Evaṃ haññatu pañcālo, saṅgāme asinā hato daḷhaṃ (pī.);
content.gathalast: Yathāhamajja pahato, khīrañca me pavaṭṭitaṃ.
content.gatha1: Yaṃ pasu khīraṃ chaḍḍeti, pasupālaṃ vihiṃsatipasupālañca hiṃsatipasu phālañca hiṃsati ;
content.gathalast: Kiṃ tattha brahmadattassa, yaṃ no garahategarahato bhavaṃ.
content.gatha1: Gārayho brahme pañcālo, brahmadattassa rājino;
content.gathalast: Arakkhitā jānapadā, adhammabalinā hatā.
content.gatha1: Rattiñhi corā khādanti, divā khādanti tuṇḍiyā;
content.gathalast: Raṭṭhasmiṃ kūṭarājassa, bahu adhammiko jano.
content.gatha1: Caṇḍā aṭanakāaṭanakaakaṭanā gāvī, yaṃ pure na duhāmase;
content.gathalast: Taṃ dāni ajja dohāma, khīrakāmehupaddutā.
content.gatha1: Evaṃ kandatu pañcālo, viputto vippasukkhatu;
content.gathalast: Yathāyaṃ kapaṇā gāvī, viputtā paridhāvati.
content.gatha1: Yaṃ pasu pasupālassa, sambhameyyapabbhameyyapabbhameyya raveyya vā;
content.gathalast: Ko nīdha aparādhatthi, brahmadattassa rājino.
content.gatha1: Aparādho mahābrahme, brahmadattassa rājino;
content.gathalast: Arakkhitā jānapadā, adhammabalinā hatā.
content.gatha1: Rattiñhi corā khādanti, divā khādanti tuṇḍiyā;
content.gatha2: Raṭṭhasmiṃ kūṭarājassa, bahu adhammiko jano;
content.gathalast: Kathaṃ no asikosatthā, khīrapā haññate pajā.
content.gatha1: Evaṃ khajjatu pañcālo, hato yuddhe saputtako;
content.gathalast: Yathāhamajja khajjāmi, gāmikehigāmakehigāmakehi araññajo.
content.gatha1: Na sabbabhūtesu vidhentividhanti rakkhaṃ, rājāno maṇḍūka manussaloke;
content.gathalast: Nettāvatā rājā adhammacārī, yaṃ tādisaṃ jīvamadeyyu dhaṅkā.
content.gatha1: Adhammarūpo vata brahmacārī, anuppiyaṃ bhāsasi khattiyassa;
content.gathalast: Viluppamānāya puthuppajāya, pūjesi rājaṃ paramappamādaṃrājaṃ paramappavādaṃrājā paramappavādiṃ .
content.gatha1: Sace imaṃ brahme surajjakaṃ siyā, phītaṃ raṭṭhaṃ muditaṃpūritaṃ vippasannaṃ;
content.gathalast: Bhutvā baliṃ aggapiṇḍañca kākā, na mādisaṃ jīvamadeyyu dhaṅkāti.
content.gatha1: Kiṃchanda kumbha jayaddisa chaddanta, atha paṇḍitasambhava sirakapi;
content.gathalast: Dakarakkhasa paṇḍaranāgavaro, atha sambula tindukadevasutoti.
